root.name: Super Time Force
root.description: OverviewSuper T.I.M.E. Force is a retro side-scrolling shooter set in the year 198X, in outer-space, that focuses on time-manipulation.Playable CharactersJean RamboisSpecial Weapon: Rapid-fire Machine Gun (Shoots 3 streams)Jef LeppardSpecial Weapon: Rocket Launcher (Splash damage)Lady SniperSpecial Weapon: Laser Gun (Shoots through walls)Shieldy BlockersonSpecial Weapon: Shield (Blocks incoming attacks)ZackasaurusSpecial Weapon: (Unknown)Lou Don JimSpecial Weapon: Lightsaber (Can be thrown)
